comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Lyndhurst, at Tarrytown, New York. The house and grounds are now operated as a museum and park by the National Trust for Historic Preservation. The former stables have been converted into a restaurant. Lyndhurst web site.

comment._content: Whyaduck:  Thank you for the information about Lyndhurst. We will update the photo information and reload the description.
